Topic.Title: Adding graphics in a specific location from a computer

Posts.EditableText:
I was looking through some old posts and I found this link: http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/samples/topic/q5zedoe560au_ii73oamoq/adding-graphics-in-a-specific-location-gui-solved

It shows how a picture can be moved to the side of UI. Unfortunately the code works only if you upload your pictures to the internet. I was wondering if there is any way to link the pictures directly from your computer?

While at it, I was also wondering if there is a way to have the picture on top, while keeping the alternative pane order, so that first I can see the picture, followed by status, followed by compass and then inventory.

Any help would be warmly appreciated!
